evam māsa traya abhyāsāt palitam hanti asaṃśayam

original: varṣaikena jarāṃ hatvā mṛtyuṃ jayati mānavaḥ // RCint_8.266 //

mardayet kanakataila yutam syāt kāminī mada vidhūnanaḥ eṣaḥ

original: asya vallayugalaṃ sasitaṃ cet sevitaṃ harati mehagaṇaugham /
analyzed: asya valla yugalam sa sitam ced sevitam harati meha gaṇa ogham

original: vīryadārḍhyakaraṇaṃ kamanīyaṃ drāvaṇaṃ nidhuvane vanitānām // RCint_8.268 //

caturmukha rasaḥ
rasa gandhaka lauha abhram samam sūta aṅghri hema ca
sarvam khalva tale kṣiptvā kanyā svarasa marditam
triphalā tulasī brāhmī rasaiḥ ca anu vimardayet
eraṇḍa patraiḥ āveṣṭya dhānya rāśau dina trayam
saṃsthāpya ca tat uddhṛtya triphalā madhu saṃyutam
etat rasāyana varam sarva rogeṣu yojayet
tat yathā agni balam khādet valī palita nāśanam
kṣayam ekādaśavidham kāsam pañcavidham tathā
kuṣṭham aṣṭādaśavidham pāṇḍu rogān pramehakān

original: śūlaṃ śvāsaṃ ca hikkāṃ ca mandāgniṃ cāmlapittakam /
analyzed: śūlam śvāsam ca hikkām ca manda agnim ca amlapittakam

original: vraṇān sarvānāmavātaṃ visarpaṃ vidradhiṃ tathā // RCint_8.274 //
analyzed: vraṇān sarvān āmavātam visarpam vidradhim tathā

krameṇa śīlitam hanti vṛkṣam indra aśaniḥ yathā

gandha lauha

original: gandhaṃ lauhaṃ bhasma madhvājyayuktaṃ sevyaṃ varṣaṃ vāriṇā traiphalena /
analyzed: gandham lauham bhasma madhu ājya yuktam sevyam varṣam vāriṇā traiphalena

original: śukle keśe kālimā divyadṛṣṭiḥ puṣṭivīryaṃ jāyate dīrghamāyuḥ // RCint_8.276 //

original: aṣṭāṃśahemni haraje śikhimūṣikāyāṃ saṃjārya ṣaḍguṇabaliṃ kramaśo 'dhikaṃ ca /

original: ūrdhvaṃ payo'gnim adhare vinidhāya dhīrāḥ siddhīḥ samagramatulāḥ svakare kurudhvam // RCint_8.277 //
